pkgmetadata.longdescription: The Jolly Good API port of Mednafen has emulators for Atari Lynx, Nintendo Virtual Boy, NEC PC Engine/TurboGrafx-16 NEC PC Engine CD/TurboDuo, NEC SuperGrafx, Sony PlayStation Sega Saturn, Super Nintendo Entertainment System/Super Famicom SNK Neo Geo Pocket Color and Bandai WonderSwan/Color.
